Description:
IllegalArgumentException when new a report

Steps to reproduce:
1. Download build.
2. Open eclipse and select /root/workspace
3. new a report, template and library

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
template and library can be created, but new report will throw exception.
this issue only happens in /root/workspace, change a new workspace then this issue will disappear

That's because you don't have the resource folder, please download the resouce folder and try again.

In addition, I'll update the code so that even user doesn't have the resouce folder, IllegalArgumentException won't be thrown.
